00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32f5xxxx_dac_dual16.h"
00030 
00031 /** @addtogroup HT32F5xxxx_Peripheral_Driver HT32F5xxxx Peripheral Driver
00032   * @{
00033   */
00034 
00035 /** @defgroup DAC_DUAL16 DAC_DUAL16
00036   * @brief DAC driver modules
00037   * @{
00038   */
00039 
00040 
00041 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00042 /** @defgroup DAC_DUAL16_Private_Define DAC private definitions
00043   * @{
00044   */
00045 #define DAC_POS_RCH                         0
00046 #define DAC_POS_LCH                         8
00047 
00048 #define DAC_TRIG_SOFTWARE_RESET            (0x00000000)
00049 #define DAC_TRIG_SOFTWARE_SET              (0x00000001)
00050 
00051 #define DAC_RCH_RESET                      (0xFFFFFFFE)
00052 #define DAC_LCH_RESET                      (0xFFFFFEFF)
00053 /**
00054   * @}
00055   */
00056 
00057 /* Private macro -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00058 /** @defgroup DAC_DUAL16_Private_Macro DAC private macros
00059   * @{
00060   */
00061 #define IS_DAC(x)                           (x == HT_DACDUAL16)
00062 
00063 #define IS_DAC_CHANNEL(CHANNEL)             (((CHANNEL) == DAC_CH_R)   || \
00064                                              ((CHANNEL) == DAC_CH_L))
00065 
00066 #define IS_DAC_DATA_SOURCE(SOURCE)          (((SOURCE) == DATA_FROM_UC)   || \
00067                                              ((SOURCE) == DATA_FROM_MIDI))
00068 
00069 #define IS_DAC_DATA(DATA)                   ((DATA) <= 0xFFFF)
00070 /**
00071   * @}
00072   */  
00073 
00074 
00075 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00076 /** @defgroup DAC_DUAL16_Exported_Functions DAC exported functions
00077   * @{
00078   */
00079 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00080  * @brief Deinitialize the DAC peripheral registers to their default reset values.
00081  * @retval None
00082  ************************************************************************************************************/
00083 void DACD16_DeInit(void)
00084 {
00085   RSTCU_PeripReset_TypeDef RSTCUReset = {{0}};
00086 
00087   RSTCUReset.Bit.DAC0 = 1;
00088 
00089   RSTCU_PeripReset(RSTCUReset, ENABLE);
00090 }
00091 
00092 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00093  * @brief  Configure the data source for the DAC channel.
00094  * @param  DACx: where DACx is the selected DAC from the DAC peripherals.
00095  * @param  DAC_CH_x: the DAC channel to configure
00096  *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00097  *     @arg DAC_CH_R : DAC Right Channel selected
00098  *     @arg DAC_CH_L : DAC Left  Channel selected
00099  * @param  DATA_FROM_x: Configure the data source.
00100  *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00101  *     @arg DATA_FROM_UC    : data and control signal from uC
00102  *     @arg DATA_FROM_MIDI  : data and control signal from MIDI
00103  * @retval None
00104  ************************************************************************************************************/
00105 void DACD16_DataSourceConfig(HT_DAC_DUAL16_TypeDef* DACx, DAC_Dual16_Ch DAC_CH_x, DAC_Dual16_Source DATA_FROM_x)
00106 {
00107   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00108   Assert_Param(IS_DAC(DACx));
00109   Assert_Param(IS_DAC_CHANNEL(DAC_CH_x));
00110   Assert_Param(IS_DAC_DATA_SOURCE(DATA_FROM_x));
00111 
00112   /* Set the select channel data source                                                                     */
00113   if (DAC_CH_x == DAC_CH_R)
00114   {
00115     DACx->CR &= DAC_RCH_RESET;
00116     DACx->CR |= DATA_FROM_x << DAC_POS_RCH;
00117   }
00118   else
00119   {
00120     DACx->CR &= DAC_LCH_RESET;
00121     DACx->CR |= DATA_FROM_x << DAC_POS_LCH;
00122   }
00123 }
00124 
00125 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00126  * @brief  Configure the data source for the DAC channel.
00127  * @param  DACx: where DACx is the selected DAC from the DAC peripherals.
00128  * @param  DAC_CH_x: the DAC channel to configure
00129  *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00130  *     @arg DAC_CH_R : DAC Right Channel selected
00131  *     @arg DAC_CH_L : DAC Left  Channel selected
00132  * @param  Data : Data to be loaded in the selected channel data register.
00133  * @retval None
00134  ************************************************************************************************************/
00135 void DACD16_SetChannelData(HT_DAC_DUAL16_TypeDef* DACx, DAC_Dual16_Ch DAC_CH_x, u16 Data)
00136 {
00137   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00138   Assert_Param(IS_DAC(DACx));
00139   Assert_Param(IS_DAC_CHANNEL(DAC_CH_x));
00140   Assert_Param(IS_DAC_DATA(Data));
00141 
00142   /* Set the select channel data                                                                            */
00143   if (DAC_CH_x == DAC_CH_R)
00144   {
00145     DACx->RH = Data;
00146   }
00147   else
00148   {
00149     DACx->LH = Data;
00150   }
00151 }
00152 
00153 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00154  * @brief Enable or Disable software start of the channel conversion of the selected DAC .
00155  * @param  DACx: where DACx is the selected DAC from the DAC peripherals.
00156  * @param  DAC_CH_x: the DAC channel to configure
00157  *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00158  *     @arg DAC_CH_R : DAC Right Channel selected
00159  *     @arg DAC_CH_L : DAC Left  Channel selected
00160  * @retval None
00161  ************************************************************************************************************/
00162 void DACD16_SoftwareStartConvCmd(HT_DAC_DUAL16_TypeDef* DACx, DAC_Dual16_Ch DAC_CH_x)
00163 {
00164   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00165   Assert_Param(IS_DAC(DACx));
00166   Assert_Param(IS_DAC_CHANNEL(DAC_CH_x));
00167 
00168   /* Start Conversion                                                                                       */
00169   if (DAC_CH_x == DAC_CH_R)
00170   {
00171       DACx->TG &= DAC_RCH_RESET ;
00172       DACx->TG |= DAC_TRIG_SOFTWARE_SET << DAC_POS_RCH;
00173   }
00174   else
00175   {
00176       DACx->TG &= DAC_LCH_RESET;
00177       DACx->TG |= DAC_TRIG_SOFTWARE_SET << DAC_POS_LCH;
00178   }
00179 }

00181   * @}
00182   */
